name: Bez Kompromisu
overview: Bez Kompromisu (No Compromise) takes place in the XXII century after the nuclear disaster in the underground base equipped with teleporters system. As a Will Render the player must find his former boss and get a revenge for spending seven years in prison, avoiding his armed mercenaries. The character starts with an I.D. card, empty plasma pistol, uncharged shield, zero credits amount and missing magnetic access card. The first task requires charging the pistol and shield, obtaining a magnetic card from the killed assassin and reclaiming the stolen money for Kirk to forge identification card. The character may walk, roll, crouch, run, shoot, use the items and talk with encountered persons. Using the pistol requires unlocking the protection first.
